name: KOR
details:
Stereo chorus/flangerKOR KO-1 is a high quality stereo in/out combined Chorus and Flanger stompbox.  The pedal gives the player different mono and stereo configurations including a dry/wet split and stereo panning from left to right, giving a more spacious feel to the Chorus or Flanger effect.
http://aalbergaudio.com/products/kor/
